name: Goodbye Bar!
author: Michael Christon of BusinessMagi

sections.description:
Allows the user to remove the WordPress Admin Bar from their sites.

The admin bar can be removed entirely or left on for different class of users

So for example, you may want “admin” to see it but no-one else.

Operation is simple.

1 – Just go to the “Settings” tab and select “Goodbye bar”

2 – You will have a list of checkboxes, now select which users you want to
see the admin bar.

3 – Click “Goodbye Bar!”

Job done!
License stuff

Good news! This plugin is FREE for everyone and released under the GPL, so you can use it on your personal or commercial blog. Obviously, you are responsible for how you use it and the plugin comes without warranty.

No donation request needed either… If you have your own business and fancy reading some cool psychology stuff to help you grow that business, then visit my small business blog and that’ll be thanks enough!

http://www.michaelchriston.com
sections.installation:
1 – Unzip into your /wp-content/plugins/ directory

2 – Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

3 – Go to “Settings” and select which users will see the Admin Bar

4 – Click “Goodbye Bar!”
